author: mehdi.aouadi
content: Hi, does the `engine_updatePayloadWithInclusionListV1` return the same `payloadId` returned by the `engine_forkChoiceUpdated` called before during the same slot or a new one?!

author: jih2nn
content: Yes it's the same. The only reason I make it return `payloadId` is I wasn't sure if there is an EL client that takes IL into account when calculating `payloadId`. Relevant discussion: https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1210529202458071050/1329845205901377639
